OOC: I think we'll play it out. 

::Epyon/Hot Rod::

Hot Rod quickly draws his laser blasters, on Nightstrike.

Epyon, brings his energy blade to Nighstrike's neck. 
"Dont fight. We wont kill you. Just say you give."
